title: lost ranked
body:
so,i was in an ranked match 10/3 score,i was carrying and my internet company needed to make a check or sth like that and i didnt had internet when we were so close to win,by any chance,can i get my win back? and get into promos

update: proof that i didnt left the game: http://imgur.com/a/Tg9PM

replies.body: Aw wow, it sucks that your ISP had downtime during such a critical moment.  :(  We have no ability to alter game stats or LP, even if it was unintentional.  If possible, bookmark any support pages your ISP might offer to be as best prepared as possible for potential downtime.  Hopefully you will get these points back in no time!
